title: Bug 124066: Context menu option 'Insert Chart' not translated into Chinese
description: Bug 124066: In the context menu, the option 'Insert Chart' is not translated into Chinese.
OB: The context menu in the software does not display the translated Chinese text for the 'Insert Chart' option.
EB: The context menu should display the translated Chinese text for the 'Insert Chart' option.
SR: To reproduce the issue: Create a report in the Chinese environment and open the context menu.
